input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: FEDERAL OFFICE FOR ROADS ASTRA - DEPARTMENT OF ROAD INFRASTRUCTURE-EAST - F3 ZOFINGEN. Summary: N02, Second Gotthard Tube (2Tg Röhre Nord) and N02 Rehabilitation of First Gotthard Tube (1Tg Röhre Süd) Bsa-Los 1302 - 20Kv Anlagen. Description: In order to enable the renovation of the existing - around 17 km long - Gotthard road tunnel, the Federal Council, Parliament and the population have decided to build a second tube. The BSA equipment of the second tube, referred to as tube north, will take place between 2027 and 2030, partly parallel to the completion of the structural work. Immediately after the opening of the North Tube for two-way traffic, the existing tube, known as the South Tube, will be replaced. The structural one Renovation is scheduled between 2030 and 2036. The existing BSA equipment on the south tube will be completely dismantled due to its age. This will be followed by structural renovation and new BSA equipment. In addition to the main work that... Foreseeing the realization of the second tube, the project also includes the redesign of the Airolo connection and the construction of the GdA gallery, which covers a 1 km long section of the motorway (km 108,140 - 107,050). The GdA will have two in the final state Lanes operated in each direction per tube. Main CPV: 31170000 transformers. Published Date: 2025-12-24. Closing Date: 2026-02-11. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Purchaser_Name: FEDERAL OFFICE FOR ROADS ASTRA - DEPARTMENT OF ROAD INFRASTRUCTURE-EAST - F3 ZOFINGEN
output.Summary: N02, Second Gotthard Tube (2Tg Röhre Nord) and N02 Rehabilitation of First Gotthard Tube (1Tg Röhre Süd) Bsa-Los 1302 - 20Kv Anlagen

instruction: Extract and classify the tender information into structured fields such as TOT ID, Tender Notice No, Tender Value, Currency, CPV, Sector, Sub-Sector, and More Details link from the following tender text.
input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: EMPA ZENTRALER EINKAUF. Summary: Pyrolysis Equipment. Description: The pyrolysis of biogenic materials is a vast field of research. In addition to biochar, pyrolysis of biogenic materials also produces oils and gases. The pyrolysis products open up new possibilities for CO2-neutral and CO2-negative materials as well as CO2-neutral energy sources. In order to research the possibilities of pyrolysis of biogenic materials, we need to be able to produce large enough quantities at different pyrolysis parameters. Unfortunately, the pyrolysis methods and production quantities are severely limited by the existing equipment. The new plant is intended to expand the possibilities in terms of production quantities and production methods as well pyrolysis parameters for biochar. A key point here is that the pyrolysis plant should be able to handle the widest possible range of source materials. <br> Doc Title: Pyrolysis Equipment <br> Contract Type: supplies. Published Date: 2025-12-22. Closing Date: 2026-02-09. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Pyrolysis Equipment
output.Description: The pyrolysis of biogenic materials is a vast field of research. In addition to biochar, pyrolysis of biogenic materials also produces oils and gases. The pyrolysis products open up new possibilities for CO2-neutral and CO2-negative materials as well as CO2-neutral energy sources. In order to research the possibilities of pyrolysis of biogenic materials, we need to be able to produce large enough quantities at different pyrolysis parameters. Unfortunately, the pyrolysis methods and production quantities are severely limited by the existing equipment. The new plant is intended to expand the possibilities in terms of production quantities and production methods as well pyrolysis parameters for biochar. A key point here is that the pyrolysis plant should be able to handle the widest possible range of source materials. <br> Doc Title: Pyrolysis Equipment <br> Contract Type: supplies

Description: The real estate agency in the city of Zurich (hereinafter referred to as IMMO) manages properties and mobile assets of the city of Zurich. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: EMPA CENTRAL PURCHASING. Summary: Pyrolysis Equipment. Description: The pyrolysis of biogenic materials is a vast field of research. In addition to biochar, pyrolysis of biogenic materials also produces oils and gases. The pyrolysis products open up new possibilities for CO2-neutral and CO2-negative materials as well as CO2-neutral energy sources. In order to research the possibilities of pyrolysis of biogenic materials, we need to be able to produce large enough quantities at different pyrolysis parameters. Unfortunately, the pyrolysis methods and production quantities are severely limited by the existing equipment. Main CPV: 39711360 Ovens. Published Date: 2025-12-19. Closing Date: 2026-02-09. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: FEDERAL OFFICE FOR ROADS ASTRA - DEPARTMENT OF ROAD INFRASTRUCTURE-EAST - F3 ZOFINGEN. Summary: N02, Second Gotthard Tube (2Tg Röhre Nord and Airolo Tunnel) and N02 Rehabilitation of the First Gotthard Tube (1Tg Röhre Süd), Bsa-Los 2004 - Optische Leiteinrichtung. Description: In order to enable the renovation of the existing - around 17 km long - Gotthard road tunnel, the Federal Council, Parliament and the population have decided to build a second tube. The BSA equipment of the second tube, referred to as tube north, will take place between 2027 and 2030, partly parallel to the completion of the structural work. Parallel to the north tube, the Galleria di Airolo (GdA) with a length of around 1 km is also being built, which is an integral part of the Gotthard system forms. The GdA will be equipped with modern lighting systems, security systems and centralized control, in accordance with ASTRA specifications. Main CPV: 34993100 Tunnel lighting. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: BASEL UNIVERSITY HOSPITAL. Summary: Replacement Surgical Image Data Management, Surgical Lights & Ceiling Supply Units. A central focus is on seamlessness Integration of the new image data management into the existing PACS to ensure the structured, secure and standardized archiving of all image and video data generated in the OR. The new operating lights and ceiling supply units should also be installed enable ergonomic, hygienic and workflow-oriented improvements and be technically coordinated. The hospital attaches particular importance to robust, economically viable and long-term operable solutions that provide a reliable Ensure operation, low lifecycle costs and sustainable expandability. The aim is to create a future-proof, digitally networked and operationally stable operating environment. The tender is carried out in three separate lots in order to make it clear To enable structuring of the procurement process and to meet the specific technical requirements of the individual components. Description: In order to enable the renovation of the existing - around 17 km long - Gotthard road tunnel, the Federal Council, Parliament and the population have decided to build a second tube. The BSA equipment of the second tube, referred to as tube north, will take place between 2027 and 2030, partly parallel to the completion of the structural work. Parallel to the north tube, the Galleria di Airolo (GdA) with a length of around 1 km is also being built, which is an integral part of the Gotthard system forms. The GdA will be equipped with modern lighting systems, security systems and centralized control, in accordance with ASTRA specifications. Main CPV: 34993100 Tunnel lighting. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: DREES & SOMMER SWITZERLAND AG. Summary: Rüschlikon Süd Train Station - Bkp 421 Gardening Work Inv00116. Description: The area around Rüschlikon train station is to be redesigned in the coming years. On the former SBB site on the lakeside side of the tracks, the “Bahnhof Süd” project is intended to create six new buildings with 37 affordable apartments, small businesses and a local supplier arise. Voters approved the corresponding design plan in November 2017. The developer for the part on the Bahnhofsplatz side (houses I (A) - III (C)) is the municipality. For the part of the Thalwil side (houses IV (D) - VI (F)) The local council has appointed the Rüschlikon Housing Foundation. This tender tenders the services for BKP 421 gardening work. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: CKW AG. Summary: Replacement of the Central Kvm-Ms System. Description: With this tender, the contracting authority intends to procure a replacement for the existing KVM matrix system in the network control center at the headquarters of CKW AG. The CKW network control center works in shifts and carries out a wide variety of tasks for both organizational units within your own business area as well as for other areas of the company. To fulfill these tasks, more than 30 different applications and control systems as well as office applications are used. These applications are operated either via dedicated servers and clients in the Operational Technology (OT) or in Information Technology (IT).<br> The work contract includes the planning, delivery and commissioning of a new KVM matrix system at the main location at a redundant replacement location. The contract also includes various options, such as the integration of a video wall, the expansion of workstations and the extension of the maintenance and support contract.<br> The maintenance and support contract regulates the maintenance of the KVM matrix system over a period of five years of operation.<br> After submitting a legally signed non-disclosure agreement Interested providers will receive the technical specification by email from the awarding authority. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: FEDERAL OFFICE FOR ROADS ASTRA - DEPARTMENT OF ROAD INFRASTRUCTURE-EAST - F3 ZOFINGEN. Summary: N02, Second Gotthard Tube (2Tg Roehre Nord) and N02 Rehabilitation of First Gotthard Tube (1Tg Roehre Sued) Bsa-Los 1302 20Kv Anlagen. Description: In order to enable the renovation of the existing - around 17 km long - Gotthard road tunnel, the Federal Council, Parliament and the population have decided to build a second tube. The BSA equipment of the second tube, referred to as the North tube, will take place in part between 2027 and 2030 parallel to the completion of the structural work. Immediately after the opening of the North Tube for two-way traffic, the existing tube, known as the South Tube, will be replaced. The structural renovation is scheduled between 2030 and 2036. The existing BSA equipment of the Due to its age, the south tube will be completely dismantled. This will be followed by structural renovation and new BSA equipment. In addition to the main work that involves the realization of the second tube, the project also includes the redesign of the Airolo connection and the construction of the GdA gallery, which covers a 1km section of the highway (km 108,140 107,050). In its final state, the GdA will be operated with two lanes in each direction per tube.<br> Main CPV: 31170000 The transformer. Published Date: 2025-12-04. Closing Date: 2026-02-11. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Description: In order to enable the renovation of the existing - around 17 km long - Gotthard road tunnel, the Federal Council, Parliament and the population have decided to build a second tube. The BSA equipment of the second tube, referred to as the North tube, will take place in part between 2027 and 2030 parallel to the completion of the structural work. Immediately after the opening of the North Tube for two-way traffic, the existing tube, known as the South Tube, will be replaced. The structural renovation is scheduled between 2030 and 2036. The existing BSA equipment of the Due to its age, the south tube will be completely dismantled. This will be followed by structural renovation and new BSA equipment. In addition to the main work that involves the realization of the second tube, the project also includes the redesign of the Airolo connection and the construction of the GdA gallery, which covers a 1km section of the highway (km 108,140 107,050). In its final state, the GdA will be operated with two lanes in each direction per tube.<br> Main CPV: 31170000 The transformer

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: FOUNDATION OF THE LAUSANNE OPERA. Summary: Outsourcing Service for the Lausanne Opera. Description: Currently, the management of its IT and telephone infrastructure is entrusted by the Opera to the Organization and IT Service (SOI) of the City of Lausanne (VdL), on the basis of a service contract. With the exception of systems linked to stage technique, all of the infrastructure is managed by the SOI. The Opera is included in the shared SOI infrastructure and is considered another City service.<br> The needs and risk management desired by the Lausanne Opera cannot be provided in full by the SOI. In this context, the Management wishes to use the services of a private company.<br> This IT service provider will be responsible for implementing a new modern and secure infrastructure solution and migrating the Opera's users and data.<br> At the end of the transition phase, it will ensure the management, administration, maintenance and security of services. The vehicles to be procured will be used primarily in urban areas (stop and go) and for commuting to work during on-call operations. The vehicles are purchased by ewb (not leased) and are intended to be one Have a useful life of at least five (5) years. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: ZURICH AIRPORT AG. Summary: Maintenance of Joints/Cracks Seasonally as Required on the Airside Areas of Flughafen Zürich Ag. Description: Flughafen Zürich AG is responsible for the maintenance of the runway system at Zurich Airport. Among other things, there is also the regular renovation of the joints and grass joints on the piste system. The renovation work depends on the vegetation pattern Spring and autumn of each year. The work is generally carried out at night. If necessary, directing work can also be carried out on Saturdays, Sundays and public holidays. Main CPV: 44113600 Bitumen and asphalt. Summary: Delivery of Iron Solution for the Precipitation of Phosphorus on Wwtp. Description: The wastewater treatment plant (WWTP) processes wastewater from the city of Winterthur and various municipalities based on contractual regulations. Today, the wastewater of more than 140,000 people and businesses is cleaned in four process stages and then discharged into the Toess.<br> In addition to the biological and mechanical cleaning, the wastewater is also chemically cleaned. One of the chemical processes - iron precipitation of phosphorus from wastewater - is used to reduce the amounts of phosphate in wastewater. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: FEDERAL OFFICE FOR ROADS ASTRA - DEPARTMENT OF ROAD INFRASTRUCTURE-EAST - F3 ZOFINGEN. Summary: N02, Second Gotthard Tube (2tg Röhre Nord and Airolo Tunnel) and N02 Rehabilitation of First Gotthard Tube (1tg Röhre Süd), Bsa-los 8303 Hausinstallationen. Description: In order to enable the renovation of the existing - around 17 km long - Gotthard road tunnel, the Federal Council, Parliament and the population have decided to build a second tube. The BSA equipment for the second tube, known as the North Tube, will take place between 2027 and 2030, partly parallel to the completion of the structural work. Parallel to the north tube, the Galleria di Airolo (GdA) with a length of around 1 km is also being built, which forms an integral part of the Gotthard system.<br> Main CPV: 31213300 cable distribution cabinet. Published Date: 2025-11-17. Closing Date: 2026-02-05. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Summary: Pl20250011 Central Renewal of Particle Pin 1030 Faido-chironico Batch 4.21: Cooling and Drainage of the Central Unit. Description: The contract includes the supply and installation of the cooling system of the three new generator sets and the penstock emptying system. The cooling system essentially consists of the main pumps, the pipes leading to the existing Moai tank (not included in this contract), the emergency pumps and the primary (open) and secondary (closed) cooling circuits for cooling the alternator and the bearings of each production unit. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: ETH ZURICH - REAL ESTATE DEPARTMENT. Summary: Eth Zurich, Hpl, Bkp 233 Lighting Delivery, Epic, Led Conversion. Description: In the EPIC areas (floors A and C) in the HPL building, as in the entire HPL, luminaires with T5 fluorescent tubes were installed. In the project perimeter and the other animal husbandries at ETH, research is being conducted into animal behavior, among other things. The light or Lighting is a determining factor in animal physiology (metabolism). That-s why high-quality light is crucial. If the lighting conditions vary, a longer acclimatization period must be expected when changing animal husbandry before use in animal experiments. Therefore, the lighting should be coordinated with the areas that have already been implemented (HCI, Prof. Razansky and in the animal husbandry in Basel).<br> Main CPV: 31520000 lights and lighting accessories. Published Date: 2025-11-15. Closing Date: 2026-01-12. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Eth Zurich, Hpl, Bkp 233 Lighting Delivery, Epic, Led Conversion

The light or Lighting is a determining factor in animal physiology (metabolism). That-s why high-quality light is crucial. Bardonnex-Coppet - Lot 183 - Renovation of Ge Ls-S (Id 11654). Description: Lot 183 aims to meet the need for cleaning up the dynamic signaling machines on the N01 and N01E roads around Geneva. It concerns more precisely the renovation of the LS-S level (PLC and local HMI parts) of the four BSA sections of the Geneva bypass :<br> • Plan-les-Ouates (SPLO);<br> • Confignon (SCFG);<br> • Vernier (SVRN);<br> • Airport (SAER).<br> The technical interfaces of lot 183 are to be established with the installations currently in operation initially and then with the new signaling which will be deployed in a second phase.<br> The summary of the work of lot 183 necessary for the implementation of the new LS-S are:<br> • drafting RPH and DAW files;<br> • the reverse engineering of the control and command of the existing signaling installations of the four BSA sections concerned: SPLO, SCFG, SVRN and SAER;<br> • supply and installation LS-S of the four BSA sections concerned;<br> • the supply of LS-S power supply cabinets;<br> • the electrical connections of the cabinets;<br> • the developments of the LS-S for the four BSA sections concerned;<br> • control command of existing signaling with the new LS-S;<br> • there software qualification (monitoring requirements, carrying out platform and site tests);<br> • deployment and on-site production of LS-S in several stages;<br> • carrying out work in technical premises (around 10 technical buildings);<br> • control migration order.... Description: The city of Duebendorf is building a new indoor swimming pool on the existing outdoor swimming pool area at Oberdorfstrasse 23, 8600 Duebendorf. The building planned as a replacement building will be located in the area of ​​the existing outdoor swimming pool infrastructure. By combining indoor and outdoor pool infrastructure at one location An attractive offer is created that primarily benefits the population. At the same time, the new indoor swimming pool should offer sufficient long-term capacity for swimming lessons and swimming sports for schools and clubs. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: PROPERTIES CITY OF ZURICH (LSZ). Summary: Framework Agreement for Ecological Upgrading of Residential Areas. Description: The subject and scope of this tender is the conclusion of three framework agreements for ecological upgrading and climate adaptation within the residential areas of properties in the city of Zurich. These ecological upgrades and climate adaptations take place as part of the urban green program. The Urban Green Program includes Program 3 - Promotion of heat-reducing measures for self-owned businesses on properties in the city of Zurich. The services include in particular gardening work, earthworks, Foundations, surfacing work (surfacing, asphalt, concrete blocks and gravel), as well as greenery, tree planting and the associated care during the first two (optionally five) years. The requirements and the associated services are in the Tender documents described in more detail. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: FEDERAL ROAD OFFICE ASTRA DEPARTMENT OF ROAD INFRASTRUCTURE EAST, ZOFINGEN BRANCH. Summary: N02, Second Gotthard Tube (2Tg Roehre Nord) and N02 Rehabilitation of First Gotthard Tube (1Tg Roehre Sued) Bsa-Los 8002 Normalisierte Schranke. Description: In order to enable the renovation of the existing - around 17 km long - Gotthard road tunnel, the Federal Council, Parliament and the population have decided to build a second tube. The BSA equipment of the second tube, referred to as the North tube, will take place in part between 2027 and 2030 parallel to the completion of the structural work. Parallel to the north tube, the Galleria di Airolo (GdA) with a length of around 1 km will also be built, which forms an integral part of the Gotthard system.<br> Main CPV: 31213300 Kabelverteilschrank. Published Date: 2025-11-10. Closing Date: 2026-01-29. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: SBB CFF FFS INFRA-ENERGIE. Summary: Machine Groups Ewag. Description: The Etzelwerk power plant, built between 1932 and 1937, uses the gradient between Lake Sihl and Lake Zurich to generate energy and produces around 10% of Switzerland's traction power requirements. After the license renewal in 2023, SBB is now renewing and replacing parts of the system of the Etzelwerk pumped storage power plant as part of the Etzelwerk power plant renewal project. The subject of this tender is the renewal of the original machine sets 1-3 as well as subsystems of machine groups 4-6. Further services are available as part of options Future renewal work on machine groups 4-7 has been tendered, which is currently planned following the work on machine groups 1-3. Further information about the project can be found in the project description (Document B1).<br> The following lots are part of this tender:<br> - Go 401 Machine groups 1 to 3, comprising the main components motor/generator and turbines of machine groups 1-3 and turbine ball valves of machine groups 1-6 (hereinafter referred to as lot 401)<br> - Lot 402 storage pump MG3, comprising the storage pump of machine group 3 and the pump ball valves Machine groups 3 and 4 (hereinafter referred to as lot 402)<br> The services advertised in this tender include the planning, manufacture, delivery, assembly, commissioning and acceptance testing of the main components and their auxiliary systems and the others advertised K.... input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: RICHTERSWIL MUNICIPAL ADMINISTRATION, WORKS. Summary: Realization and Operation of Public Charging Infrastructure. Description: With this tender, the municipality of Richterswil is granting concessions for the implementation and operation of public charging stations in municipal parking spaces. The vehicles to be procured will be primarily for urban use (stop and go) and for commuting to work during on-call operations used. The vehicles are purchased from ewb (not leased) and should have a useful life of at least five (5) years. The charging infrastructure for electric vehicles is excluded from this tender. They are advertised in the section 6.6 of the specifications. We are looking for a minimum of one contractual partner (= 1 contractual partner for all 3 lots), or a maximum of three (3) contractual partners (i.e. one contractual partner per lot with all vehicle categories required therein). input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: SBB CFF FFS INFRA-ENERGIE. Summary: Machine Groups Ewag. Description: The Etzelwerk power plant, built between 1932 and 1937, uses the gradient between Lake Sihl and Lake Zurich to generate energy and produces around 10% of Switzerland's traction power requirements. After the license renewal in 2023, SBB is now renewing and replacing parts of the system of the Etzelwerk pumped storage power plant as part of the Etzelwerk power plant renewal project. The subject of this tender is the renewal of the original machine sets 1-3 as well as subsystems of machine groups 4-6. Further services are available as part of options Future renewal work on machine groups 4-7 has been tendered, which is currently planned following the work on machine groups 1-3. Further information about the project can be found in the project description (Document B1).<br> The following lots are part of this tender:<br> - Go 401 Machine groups 1 to 3, comprising the main components motor/generator and turbines of machine groups 1-3 and turbine ball valves of machine groups 1-6 (hereinafter referred to as lot 401)<br> - Lot 402 storage pump MG3, comprising the storage pump of machine group 3 and the pump ball valves Machine groups 3 and 4 (hereinafter referred to as lot 402)<br> The services advertised in this tender include the planning, manufacture, delivery, assembly, commissioning and acceptance testing of the main components and their auxiliary systems and the others advertised K.... Published Date: 2025-11-05. Closing Date: 2026-03-13. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Summary: Implementation of an Iot Infrastructure for Building Management (M348ti) Electrical Installations Mandate. Description: Electrical installation services<br> Estimate: CHF 579,000.-<br> The Energy Department of the City of Geneva (hereinafter abbreviated by ENE) acts to maintain and optimize technical installations and reduce the energy consumption of the built heritage of the City of Geneva. In the as part of a loan granted by the City of Geneva for the development of loT projects, ENE wants to set up an loT network based mainly on LoRa technology and covering the entire value chain, i.e. sensors, the LoRa network, data processing and visualization collected. ENE already manages some 400 installed sensors today and plans to deploy more than 1,500 as part of this project. A service provider is being sought to set up and manage this future LoT network as well as to promote and present the data collected.<br> The project covers the establishment of a LoT network using LoRa technology for the recording and processing of data generated by sensors deployed in buildings in the territory of the City of Geneva. The project includes the following elements:<br> * Provision of a LoRa service based on an existing network with geographical coverage covering the territory of the City of Geneva and neighboring municipalities;<br> * The supply and installation of sensors ensuring the recording and sending of data (temperatures, humidity, energy, water, gas, alarms, etc.);<br> * Implementation of interfaces Nec.... Summary: N02, Secondo Tubo San Gottardo (2tg Tube North and Galleria Di Airolo) and N02 Risanamento Primo Tubo San Gottardo (1tg Tube South), Bsa Lot 8001 - Structural Facilities. Description: In order to enable the renovation of the existing - around 17 km long - Gotthard road tunnel, the Federal Council, Parliament and the population have decided to build a second tube. The BSA equipment for the second tube, known as the North Tube, will take place between 2027 and 2030, partly parallel to the completion of the structural work. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: SBB CFF FFS INFRA-ENERGIE. Summary: Machine Groups Ewag. Description: The Etzelwerk power plant, built between 1932 and 1937, uses the gradient between Lake Sihl and Lake Zurich to generate energy and produces around 10% of Switzerland's traction power requirements. After the license renewal in 2023, SBB is now renewing and replacing parts of the system of the Etzelwerk pumped storage power plant as part of the Etzelwerk power plant renewal project. The subject of this tender is the renewal of the original machine sets 1-3 as well as subsystems of machine groups 4-6. Further services are available as part of options Future renewal work on machine groups 4-7 has been tendered, which is currently planned following the work on machine groups 1-3. Further information about the project can be found in the project description (Document B1).<br> The following lots are part of this tender:<br> - Go 401 Machine groups 1 to 3, comprising the main components motor/generator and turbines of machine groups 1-3 and turbine ball valves of machine groups 1-6 (hereinafter referred to as lot 401)<br> - Lot 402 storage pump MG3, comprising the storage pump of machine group 3 and the pump ball valves Machine groups 3 and 4 (hereinafter referred to as lot 402)<br> The services advertised in this tender include the planning, manufacture, delivery, assembly, commissioning and acceptance testing of the main components and their auxiliary systems and the others advertised K.... input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: SWISSGRID AG. Summary: Gcn 2.0 Project Support. Description: Swissgrid today operates a Switzerland network grid Control Network (GCN), which ensures the safe exchange of information between the sub -works, the SGC (Swissgrid Control Center in Aarau and Prilly), the data centers of the Swissgrid and Partner Evus.<br> Today's GCN is located in the last third of his life cycle, which is secured by the end of 2030.<br> To ensure the safe operation of the SwissGrid telecommunications services in the future and to ensure reliable language and data communication, a replacement of the existing GCN is necessary.
